eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 06:06 PM ON NOV 14, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:12 AM NOV 15, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Maricopa County. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. The Phoenix Police Department is looking for Tristan Whitworth last seen at North 28th Street and East Sweetwater Avenue on foot wearing a gray t-shirt, blue jeans, and white tennis shoes. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
